title: Philip Marlowe and Philo Vance

The Adventures Of Philip Marlowe is up first on this week’s Case Closed. We hear The Name To Remember, his story from April 9, 1949.

(30:05) Philo Vance closes the show with his episode from February 14, 1950, The Scarface Murder Case.
